metadata.title: CVE-2020-35982 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and 1.0.1. There is aninvalid pointer dereference in the function gf_hinter_track_finalize() inmedia_tools/isom_hinter.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
